sqlMap.select: SELECT n.PK, replace(n.DOMAIN, '微信.', '') AS DOMAIN, n.IMG_LINK, n.TRUTH_DEGREE, c.PK AS COMMENT_ID, n.TITLE, LEFT(n.SUB_TITLE, 55) AS SUB_TITLE, n.URL, n.TRUTH_DEGREE, n.OPINION_TIMES, n.IMG_LOC_PATH, DATE_FORMAT(n.CREATE_TIME,'%m月%d日') AS CREATE_TIME, n.SETTLE_DATE, n.OPINION_TIMES, n.STATE, u.USERNAME, p.PUBLIC_NAME, p.PUBLIC_NO FROM T_REALLY_NEWS n LEFT JOIN T_REALLY_USER u ON n.CREATOR_ID = u.PK LEFT JOIN T_MANAGE_WECHAT_PUBLIC p ON n.SOGOU_OPENID = p.OPEN_ID LEFT JOIN T_REALLY_COMMENT c ON n.PK = c.NEWS_ID WHERE n.STATE = '0' AND DATE_FORMAT(n.CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d') = #dailyDate# ORDER BY n.CREATE_TIME DESC
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d') AS CREATE_TIME FROM T_REALLY_NEWS WHERE STATE = '0' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d') ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT n.PK, n.URL, replace(n.DOMAIN, '微信.', '') AS DOMAIN, n.IMG_LINK, n.TITLE, n.SUB_TITLE, n.CONTENT, n.STATE, DATE_FORMAT(n.CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d %H:%i:%S') AS CREATE_TIME, n.TRUTH_DEGREE, n.OPINION_TIMES, c.CONTENT AS COMMENT, c.PK AS COMMENT_ID FROM T_REALLY_NEWS n LEFT JOIN T_REALLY_COMMENT c ON n.PK = c.NEWS_ID WHERE n.PK = #id#

SELECT n.PK, replace(n.DOMAIN, '微信.', '') AS DOMAIN, n.IMG_LINK, n.TRUTH_DEGREE, c.PK AS COMMENT_ID, n.TITLE, LEFT(n.SUB_TITLE, 55) AS SUB_TITLE, n.URL, n.TRUTH_DEGREE, n.OPINION_TIMES, n.IMG_LOC_PATH, DATE_FORMAT(n.CREATE_TIME,'%m月%d日') AS CREATE_TIME, n.SETTLE_DATE, n.OPINION_TIMES, n.STATE, u.USERNAME, p.PUBLIC_NAME, p.PUBLIC_NO FROM T_REALLY_NEWS n LEFT JOIN T_REALLY_USER u ON n.CREATOR_ID = u.PK LEFT JOIN T_MANAGE_WECHAT_PUBLIC p ON n.SOGOU_OPENID = p.OPEN_ID LEFT JOIN T_REALLY_COMMENT c ON n.PK = c.NEWS_ID
n.STATE = '0'
DATE_FORMAT(n.CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #queryStartDate# AND #queryEndDate#
ORDER BY n.STATE DESC, n.CREATE_TIME DESC LIMIT #start#, #end#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS queryCount FROM T_REALLY_NEWS n
n.STATE = '1'
DATE_FORMAT(n.CREATE_TIME,'%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #queryStartDate# AND #queryEndDate#
SELECT COUNT(*) AS queryCount FROM T_REALLY_NEWS WHERE STATE = '0' OR STATE = '1' OR STATE IS NULL
SELECT PK FROM T_REALLY_NEWS WHERE SOGOU_DOCID = #sogouDocid#
